scripts.build: yarn workspace \@eclipse-cdt-cloud/cdt-gdb-memoryview build && yarn workspace cdt-gdb-vscode build
scripts.watch: yarn workspace \@eclipse-cdt-cloud/cdt-gdb-memoryview run watch && yarn workspace cdt-gdb-vscode run watch
scripts.vsce:package: yarn workspace \@eclipse-cdt-cloud/cdt-gdb-memoryview build && yarn workspace \@eclipse-cdt-cloud/cdt-gdb-memoryview webpack --mode production && yarn workspace cdt-gdb-vscode run vsce:package
